quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易混淆“patient”的词性，将“patient zero”误理解为“没有耐心的人”（把“patient”当形容词），或字面直译忽略其“传染病首例感染者”的核心含义
quiz_item.sentence: Scientists traced the outbreak of the new virus back to **patient zero**, a tourist who had visited the market where the first cases were reported.

option.definition: （传染病的）零号病人（第一个已知感染者）
编号为零的普通住院病人
